messages.subject: Thanks / Re: Want to make this happen for Sorscha - need some US help
messages.msgSnippet: WOW, ya ll are amazing!  Thanks so much for all the eyes and phone calls to make this happen for a child in our community.  Unschoolers are the absolute
messages.messageBody:
WOW, ya'll are amazing! Thanks so much for all the eyes and phone
calls to make this happen for a child in our community. Unschoolers
are the absolute coolest people!

We want to thank Eric & Jules in LA for finding a bear!!! THANKS!

I also just wanted to post a few things of appreciation that my
Radical Unschooled kiddo has said after I read everyone's post to
her.

"That is soooo nice. That is probably one of the nicest things
someone has done for me. I feel loved!"

"Everyone did that just for me - brain overload."

"I can't believe someone is going to drive to a store - out of their
way - just to get one for ME!"

"This is one of the happiest days of my life."

She is soooo appreciative and grateful. Ohhh, now she said, "Mom,
what was the happiest day of your life? When I was born????"

Funny kid - I just love her.
Thanks so much again.
~Crystal & Tails (aks: Sorscha)~

Ill look around and see what else i can find out.......




Nicole

messages.subject: Want to make this happen for Sorscha - need some US help
messages.msgSnippet: Sorscha asked me to post her `urgent message .   The state of New Mexico in the USA is completely out of Build a Bear Pumpkin Kitty and she s desperately
messages.messageBody:
Sorscha asked me to post her `urgent message'. The state of New
Mexico in the USA is completely out of Build a Bear Pumpkin Kitty and
she's desperately trying to purchase one for her collection. I have
exhausted my local search and also contacted the main office to no
avail. She bid on several on Ebay but keeps loosing them to higher
bidders. She is concerned the price on Ebay is going to go up and up.
Some stores in the US still have a few of these bears for the original
price.

If anyone in the US wouldn't mind checking their local BaB and picking
one up for her (unstuffed), we will send you a check for the bear &
postage immediately. Please contact us off list at
WillowsFortresss@....

Thank you so much for considering. This means so much to her and I
want to try everything I can to help her obtain one at a reasonable
price.
~Crystal & Sorscha (aka: Tails)~
http://livingtheliquidlife.blogspot.com/
